<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Groups </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the cowardice level (the lack of courage or bravery) of a group or unit.
<br><br>
Notes:
* The more cowardice a [[Group]] or [[Object]] has, the sooner it will start fleeing.
* 0 means maximum courage, while 1 means always fleeing.
* More details in [[fleeing]]
 </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> name '''allowFleeing''' cowardice </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> name: [[Object]] or [[Group]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> cowardice: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_group1 [[allowFleeing]] 0;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[fleeing]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
